content.question: In the first sentence of the passage, what is the main purpose for exaggerating the condition of the “petrified” animals?

choices.label: To explain how frightened the animals were by the winter storm
To emphasize the profound stillness of the winter scene
To contrast the animals’ figures against the backdrop of white snow
To personify the animals by relating their feelings about old Christmas’s “cruel-seeming spell”

content.answer: To emphasize the profound stillness of the winter scene

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
